'''''At the Construction of the Endless Wall''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find the supply [[Chest]]s, consisting of two Common Chests and one Precious Chest, left by the [[Millelith]] at [[Chizhang Wall]]. 

The [[Ancient City Key]] and the [[Chizhang Map]] required for this achievement can be found in a ruined tower towards the east of Chizhang Wall.
